actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to prohibit the issuance in bearer form of securities which are interests in Treasury obligations.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to prohibit the issuance in bearer form of securities which are interests in Treasury obligations. Provides that the issue price of any registration-required obligation shall be treated as the principal amount of the obligation.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to prohibit the issuance in bearer form of securities which are interests in Treasury obligations.
